title: Varied service adapted to your expectations

content.0: Securing urban land is one of the priorities of GIF-CO SARL development policy. In the respect of general interest research, GIF-CO SARL provides a quality service from land mastership to urban planning by the rationalization of soil potential.
content.1: At GIF-CO SARL we offer sites and land with land ownership certificate. A technical assistance from the first step until your ownership certificate obtaining and building permit.
content.2: Of course by including your budget regulation.
content.3: A quality service through a professionalism based on a collaboration with land planners, planners, surveyors, urbanists, lawyers and notaries.
